name: stupefy
content:
stupefy verb [T]
(TIRE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make someone unable to think clearly, usually because they are extremely tired or have taken drugs

stupefy verb [T]
(TIRE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
to tire or bore someone so much that the person cannot think or do anything: His classes totally stupefied me.
stupefy verb [T]
(SURPRISE)
to shock someone; stun: He was stupefied to learn that he was fired.
